animeTitle: Tsuru ni Notte: Tomoko no Bouken
animeDescription: A young girl named Tomoko visits the Hiroshima Peace Memorial. There she has a mysterious meeting with Sadako, the little girl who was 2 years old when the U.S. dropped the bomb on her city during WWII and 11 when she died from the effects of radiation poisoning. Sadako takes Tomoko on an eye-opening journey.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Arihara Seiji', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Screenplay']], ['Baisho Chieko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Koroku Reijirou', ['Theme Song Composition', 'Theme Song Arrangement', 'Music']]]
